entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to set SignInScheme in an application using Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.OpenIdConnect on multiple IDPs #42493
    Discussions
  • Improve route pattern related errors when working with route groups #42491
  • WebTransport API #42490
  • Allow configuring W3CLogging to write to stdout #42489
    .NET 8 Planning
  • An error was encountered while registering a service worker js script in the MAUI Blazor Hybrid application #42488
    Discussions
  • Disable MS Graph options on the Blazor wasm template for B2C #42487
  • Blazor: support webpack module federation flow #42486

Closed

  • Introduce WebApplicationBuilder.Authorization property that allows for AuthZ setup #42235
    7.0-preview7
  • ANCM PostStartCheck Failure #42363
  • Howto call Azure AD B2C Change Password profile from Blazor WASM #42479
  • IAsyncEnumerable on Blazor #42484
  • Fixer/Analyzer: Suggest rewriting builder.Host.ConfigureServices to builder.Services #35817
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Update MouseEventArgs. Add MovementX MovementY #38602
    7.0-preview7
  • Fixer/Analyzer: Suggest switching builder.Host.ConfigureAppConfiguration and builder.Host.ConfigureHostConfiguration to use the builder.Configuration property directly #35815
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Change status code 200 to 204 for DefaultApiConventions.Delete #42468
  • SignalR Client connection is very slow when adding kestrel section to appsettings.json file and setting https or http url. #42461

PullRequests

Created

  • AuthN: Use single scheme as DefaultScheme #42497
  • Remove Pseudo-Headers From Public API #42496
    area-runtime
  • Use AddAuthentication method instead of property on WAB #42494
    area-web-frameworks, feature-authentication

Merged

  • Add AuthorizationBuilder #42264
    area-security, 7.0-preview7
  • Implement analyzer that suggests using builder.Services to ConfigureServices method #42356
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview7
  • Use GetFolderPath(UserProfile) to obtain HOME dir #41865
    area-dataprotection, area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview7
  • Update MouseEventArgs to include MovementX, MovementY #42451
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview7
  • Implementing analyzer to prefer WebApplicationBuilder.Configuration over Configure methods #42351
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview7

Updated

  • Fix CollectionModelBinder BindSimpleCollection null value handling #42278
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Generate Composite Images Redistributable #42477
    area-infrastructure
  • Make RateLimitingMiddleware endpoint aware #42417
    area-runtime
  • Identity UI: Input forms' `form-floating` broken styles fixed. #42075
    area-identity, community-contribution, 7.0-preview7
  • Adding the rest of WebTransport into Kestrel #42097
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview7
  • Add File Id to IBrowserFile Interface #42480
    area-blazor
  • Adding ProblemDetailsService #42384
    area-web-frameworks
  • macOS dev-certs overhaul #42251
    area-commandlinetools, feature-devcerts, blog-candidate
  • Add IgnoreQueryString parameter to NavLink #40990
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Introducing `I*HttpResult` interfaces #42385
    area-web-frameworks
  • Kestrel: Support full cert chain #41944
    area-runtime
